description:
Professional Lighting Made Easy with 
High-Efficiency Long Lasting LED Bulbs!There are 36 ultra-bright LED's packed into this compact lighting system.They are 50x brighter than average bulbs, but never get hot. With an average lifetime of 50,000 hours, you'll have all the light you need.The built-in diffuser spreads the light to provide even illumination which helps eliminate harsh reflections and shadows while simulating bright, natural lighting.Universal Design
The Chromo LED light can be used on any camera with a tripod or shoe mount!

Never Run Out of Power!
Equipped with a compact lithium rechargeable battery, this LED light offers up to 1 hr. of continuous lighting with no flickering. The battery is charged by the included ext. AC battery charger.Compatible With:Canon EOS 100D / EOS 700D / EOS 6D / EOS 5D Mark II / 5D Mark III / EOS-1D C / 60D / 50D / 40D / 30D / 20D / 10D / 7D / T4i / T3 / T3i / T2i / T1i / XS / XSi / XT / XTi / 650D / 600D / 1100D / 550D / EOS-1D XNikon D7100 / D5200 / D600 / D7000 / D5100 / D5000 / D3200 / D3100 / D3000 / D800E / D800 / D700 / D300S / D90 / D60 / D3 / J1 / V1Sony A58 / A37 / NEX-7 / NEX-5N / NEX-5 / NEX-3 / NEX-C3 / SLT-A77 / SLT-A65 / SLT-A55 / SLT-A33 / DSLR-A580 / DSLR-A560 / DSLR-A550 / DSLR-A500 / DSLR-A450 / DSLR-A390Pentax K-5 II / K-5 IIs / K-30 / K-01Sony SLT-A58 / SLT-A99 / SLT-A37 / SLT-A57 / SLT-A65 / SLT-A77 / SLT-A35Fujifilm X-Pro1 / X10, Leica M-Monochrom / M9-P And more
title: Chromo Inc. Rechargeable Ultra-Bright LED 36 Camera / Video Light Flash with Hot Shoe and Tripod Adapter for Canon , Sony , Nikon and Other DSLR Cameras
